name: neon DASH
description:
If you liked super meat boy you're the target audience

Use your num pad to point where you'll go. each number represents a spot on a map.

You can play even if your keyboard doesn't have numpad.

You don't have direct control, there is no jumping and no wasd movement. But it still plays like fast paced platformer. And from my short experience the skill ceiling could be really high, while the learning curve is not too steep.

I just realized that I forgot to make enemy movement frame independent(I left it in regular update), so if you see super fast enemies just skip that level, it's visible only in couple of later levels, so don't skip this game because of that.
